mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FEED (F_IDX, REGDATE, CONTENT, U_IDX, U_LIKE, F_PIC) VALUES(FEED_SEQ.nextval, SYSDATE, #{content}, #{uIdx},0, #{fPic})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT FD.F_IDX, FD.REGDATE, FD.CONTENT, FD.U_IDX, FD.U_LIKE, FD.F_PIC FROM FEED FD, (SELECT * FROM FOLLOW WHERE FROM_IDX = #{uIdx}) FW WHERE FD.U_IDX = FW.TO_IDX OR FD.U_IDX = #{uIdx}
